transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Sakara energy mein baat ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Nahi
Executive: Actually sir main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi senior manager aap connect discussion hua tha Rishi ke sath IndiaMART kya kya company ke liye
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Thoda disturbance aa raha hai
Executive: Sir main actually IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi senior manager aapka jo catalog hai na Sakara energy usse related na aapka discussion hua hoga Rishi ke sath ki aapko IndiaMART ki taraf se koi call nahi chahiye sir right?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Hai na so actually maine usi cheez ke related aapko call kiya tha sir kyunki na aapke paas feedback gaya hoga to waha pe aapne na not satisfied mark kar diya hai right?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Hai na so actually kya hai ki by mistake aapke paas wo feedback gaya tha waise to aapke sath discussion bhi nahi hua tha Rishi ke sath right so maine aapko wahi cheez batane ke liye call kiya hai ki aage se hum ye cheez maintain rakhenge aage se hum ye cheez dhyan rakhenge ki aapko hamari side se calls nahi chahiye right aapko agar koi issue hota hai to agar comfortable aapka disturbance bahut disturbance ho raha hai
Customer: 
Executive: Sir abhi clear aa rahi hai kya aapko voice meri?
Customer: Bahut bahut disturbance beech beech mein
Executive: Accha main already mein aa chuki hu tabhi main aapse puch rahi hu ki abhi clear kya aapko meri voice?
Customer: Haan
Executive: Okay so main aapse ye keh rahi thi sir ki already na aapka discussion hua tha Rishi ke sath to shayad aapko IndiaMART ki taraf se koi call nahi chahiye right aapka kehna ye hai ki agar aapko koi bhi issue aata hai to aap khud IndiaMART ko coordinate karenge right?
Customer: Woh madam mera abhi Sakara energy se kuch len den nahi hai iske liye mujhe call nahi chahiye
Executive: Kya nahi kya kya hai sir?
Customer: Sakara energy mein nahi hu main abhi theek hai
Executive: Accha accha accha theek hai koi problem nahi hai main ek kaam karti hu sir agar aap comfortable hai na
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan
Customer: Main keh rahi hu sir main ek kaam karti hu agar aap comfortable hai to main aapko apna number whatsapp pe hai bhi maar de rahi hu aapki aapka same number whatsapp pe rahega sir
Executive: Kis cheez ke liye lekin?
Executive: Agar aapko kuch bhi problem hota hai to aap directly apne side se hume call message kar sakte ho iske lekar ki hum aapko coordinate nahi karenge aapko koi bhi issue hota hai to aap mujhe waha par message drop kar dijiyega phir hum uske according coordinate kar lenge theek hai but main ye make sure karungi ki aapko hamari side se phir call koi koi call nahi jaye taaki aapko disturbance na ho right?
Customer: Call nahi aana chahiye mujhe sir
Executive: Haan haan main ye kar deti hu baki na sir abhi jo aapne not satisfied mark kiya hai us wo abhi main wapas se aapke paas ek feedback share karungi sir mail par please waha par positive feedback provide kara dijiyega theek hai kyunki already jo bhi aapki problem thi wo maine aapki resolve kara di ki haan aapko hamari side se koi call nahi jayega
Customer: Abhi woh bola hai aapne bhi bola hai dekhna padega aa raha hai nahi call aa raha hai
Executive: Sir aayega nahi
Customer: Aayega kabhi nahi main apni team ko mana karke rakhungi main aapko apni team ko mana kar dungi ki aapko koi call nahi chahiye theek hai wo aapka jo case hai wo main apne under le lungi ki mere ko aapke case pe call nahi karna hai theek hai to uske liye aap befikar rahiye aapko call nahi jayega hamari side se jo aapka matlab issue hai ki hamari
Customer: Gaadi dala column leke aa rakha hai kya ke leke aa raha hai mere ko samjh nahi aa raha hai
Executive: Hai na to haan to wo main karwa deti hu baki na abhi main aapke paas ek mail share karungi bas main aapko
Customer: Bas ho gaya kitna baras se wahi wahi chal raha hai yaar
Executive: Hello
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not want calls from IndiaMART.

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' in feedback.

- Customer says there is disturbance in the call.



Resolution:

- Executive assured no further calls from IndiaMART.

- Executive offered personal WhatsApp number for contact.

- Executive will resend feedback form for positive rating.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- unwanted calls, feedback, resolution, disturbance
